mapper.insert: insert into dotchat_user(user_phonenumber, user_name, user_password) values (#{user_phonenumber}, #{user_name}, #{user_password})
insert into dotchat_user(user_name, user_phonenumber, user_email, user_password) values (#{user_name}, #{user_phonenumber}, #{user_email}, #{user_password})
mapper.select: select * from dotchat_user where user_name = (#{user_name}) and user_password = (#{user_password})
select user_id from dotchat_user where user_name = (#{user_name})
select * from dotchat_user_info where user_id not in (#{user_id}) order by user_id desc limit 3

SELECT * FROM dotchat_user_info WHERE user_id = ANY (SELECT user_id FROM dotchat_follow WHERE follow_id = (#{user_id}))
mapper.update: update dotchat_user_count set user_follows_count = user_follows_count + 1 where user_id = (#{user_id})
